snippet.title: Trans-Siberian Railway Simulator - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
☛ Trans-Siberian Railway Simulator - https://store.steampowered.com/app/998400/TransSiberian_Railway_Simulator

Get behind the wheels of classic Russian locomotives and check if the wild animals, bad people, severe frosts and constantly changing weather are able to stop you. Try to survive in the longest railway line in the world! 

☛ PlayWay's Facebook Profile - https://www.facebook.com/PlayWayGames 
☛ PlayWay's Twitter Profile - https://twitter.com/play_way
☛ PlayWay's Discord server - https://discord.gg/pPcEeVF

#Trains #Survival #Simulator #PC #Siberia #Russia #USSR #FPP
